question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements, Outdoor Warning Sirens, Storm Drain Master Plan, Malibu Road Slope Repairs, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs
evidence_answer: Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements, Outdoor Warning Sirens, Storm Drain Master Plan, Malibu Road Slope Repairs, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain, Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs
